    GetVPNDeviceConfigurationScript:
      value: "! Microsoft Corporation\r

        !
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------\
        ----------------------------------------------\r

        ! Sample VPN tunnel configuration template for IOS-based
        devices\r

        !\r

        ! This configuration template applies to Cisco VPN devices
        running IOS 15.1 or beyond (ISR or ASR)\r

        !\r

        \r

        \r

        \t\t\r

        \r

        !
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------\
        ----------------------------------------------\r

        ! ACL rules\r

        !\r

        ! Some VPN devices require explicit ACL rules to allow
        cross-premises traffic:\r

        !\r

        ! 1. Allow traffic between on premises address ranges and VNet
        address ranges\r

        ! 2. Allow IKE traffic (UDP:500) between on premises VPN devices
        and Azure VPN gateway\r

        ! 3. Allow IPsec traffic (Proto:ESP) between on premises VPN
        devices and Azure VPN gateway\r

        !\r

        \t\t\r

        access-list 101 permit ip 10.1.0.0 0.0.255.255 10.0.0.0
        0.0.255.255\r

        \r

        !
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------\
        ----------------------------------------------\r

        ! Internet Key Exchange (IKE) configuration\r

        !\r

        ! This section specifies the authentication, encryption,
        hashing, and Diffie-Hellman group parameters for IKE\r

        ! main mode or phase 1\r

        !\r

        \r

        crypto ikev2 proposal SwaggerS2S-proposal\r

        \  encryption DES3\r

        \  integrity  SHA384\r

        \  group      DHGroup24\r

        \  lifetime   3600\r

        \ exit\r

        \r

        crypto ikev2 policy SwaggerS2S-policy\r

        \  proposal SwaggerS2S-proposal\r

        \  exit\r

        \r

        crypto ikev2 keyring SwaggerBranch-keyring\r

        \t\t\r

        \t\tpeer 52.173.199.254\r

        \t\taddress        52.173.199.254\r

        \t\tpre-shared-key
        lALEHuppeopJmA94exRNiRr2QzuZ6lOsvzu5IlJUEA6LthbTc8g5MTT86MCsGNMzGkTAaLu\
        LnEJoD1Cn4cIlr94qKZm9drsgllzWvsPNezS71stAkaW1Bb7h6GBnDlDP\r

        \  exit\r

        \r

        crypto ikev2 profile  SwaggerS2S-profile\r

        \  match address  local 10.3.0.0\r

        \tmatch identity remote address 52.173.199.254 255.255.255.255\r

        \t\t\r

        \  authentication remote pre-share\r

        \  authentication local  pre-share\r

        \  keyring        SwaggerBranch-keyring\r

        \  exit\r

        \r

        !
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------\
        ----------------------------------------------\r

        ! IPsec configuration\r

        !\r

        ! This section specifies encryption, authentication, tunnel mode
        properties for the Phase 2 negotiation\r

        !\r

        crypto ipsec transform-set SwaggerS2S-TransformSet DES3 DES3\r

        \ mode  tunnel\r

        \ exit\r

        \r

        !
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------\
        ----------------------------------------------\r

        ! Crypto map configuration\r

        !\r

        ! This section defines a crypto profile that binds the
        cross-premises network traffic to the IPsec and IKE\r

        ! policy profiles for this connection. Then defines the VTI
        (virtual tunnel interface) with the crypto\r

        ! profile. A random interface number (tunnel 1) was used with a
        random link local address (169.254.0.1/28)\r

        ! for the tunnel interface. If either selection is already used
        in the VPN device, please select another\r

        ! interface number or address.  The only requirement is that
        they must not overlap with another interface\r

        ! on the same VPN device.\r

        !\r

        crypto ipsec profile SwaggerS2S-IPsecProfile\r

        \  set transform-set  SwaggerS2S-TransformSet\r

        \  set ikev2-profile  SwaggerS2S-profile\r

        \  set pfs            None\r

        \  set security-association lifetime 3600\r

        \ exit\r

        \r

        \r

        int tunnel 52.173.199.254\r

        \  ip address 169.254.0.1 255.255.255.252\r

        \  ip tcp adjust-mss 1350\r

        \  tunnel source 10.3.0.0\r

        \  tunnel mode ipsec ipv4\r

        \  tunnel destination 52.173.199.254\r

        \  tunnel protection ipsec profile SwaggerS2S-IPsecProfile\r

        \  exit\r

        \r

        \tip route 10.0.0.0 255.255.0.0 tunnel 52.173.199.254 "

          type: string
        localAddress:
          description: The virtual network gateway's local address.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        messagesReceived:
          description: The number of BGP messages received.
          format: int64
          readOnly: true
          type: integer
        messagesSent:
          description: The number of BGP messages sent.
          format: int64
          readOnly: true
          type: integer
        neighbor:
          description: The remote BGP peer.
          readOnly: true
          type: string
        routesReceived:
          description: The number of routes learned from this peer.
          format: int64
          readOnly: true
          type: integer
        state:
          description: The BGP peer state.

          type: string

          type: integer

          description: The BGP peering address and BGP identifier of this BGP speaker.

        peerWeight:
          description: The weight added to routes learned from this BGP speaker.

          type: integer

      x-ms-enum:
        modelAsString: true
